attributes.action: Make a national register for disabled people
attributes.additional_details: Because  Disabled people need to have a register just like  other registers , then if claiming benefits or claiming medical items or prescriptions or anything the authorities will have the disabled people on a register it would make it a lot easier for disabled people and their disabilities,  a proper register where they are registered as disabled people,  as people could easily look at someone and say they aren't disabled when they actually are .
attributes.background: I want the government to  have a register for Disabled people as currently there is no national register,  and it may benefit disabled people if there was,  especially when it comes to medical issues and things

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what a register would be used for, and by whom. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
